name: The 11th International Conference on Digital Image Processing
content: \*History\* ICDIP conferences have been held annually in Bangkok (Thailand), Singapore, Chengdu (China) (2011, 2016), Kuala Lumpur (Malaysia), Beijing (China), Athens (Greece), Los Angeles (USA), Hong Kong, Shanghai (China) since 2009\. So far the previous 9 conference proceedings have been indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus! \*Publication\* Accepted (Registered and Presented) papers will be collected in the conference proceedings by SPIE, which will be included in SPIE Digital Library and submitted for Scopus, Ei Compendex, etc, to ensure maximum awareness of the Proceedings. \*Sponsor\* ICDIP 2019 is co-sponsored by Sun Yat-Sen University, East China Normal University and International Association of Computer Science and Information Technology, and technically assisted by many universities and institutes. \*Venue\* Sun Yat-Sen University
